title: Master Java For Loops: From Basics to Practice
description: Learn and practice Java for loops through interactive coding challenges. Master loop syntax, iteration patterns, and common use cases.

metadata.title: Welcome to Java For Loops
metadata.description: Displays task or question text with optional formatting

props.title: Welcome to Java For Loops
props.prompt: In this module, you'll learn how to use for loops in Java to repeat code blocks efficiently. For loops are fundamental to programming and allow you to execute code multiple times without writing it over and over. Let's start by understanding the basic syntax and then practice with real coding challenges.

metadata.title: Feedback Box
metadata.description: Shows correctness, explanation, and next steps

props.title: Module Overview
props.message: You're starting a beginner-level Java for loops module. This module contains interactive coding exercises to build your skills.
props.explanation: For loops are essential control structures in Java that help you write efficient, readable code when you need to repeat actions.

props.question: How confident are you with Java for loops?

metadata.title: Code Editor
metadata.description: Interactive code editor with run and reset functionality

props.title: Challenge 1: Print Numbers 1 to 10

testCases.description: Should print numbers 1 through 10, each on a new line

metadata.title: Feedback Box
metadata.description: Shows correctness, explanation, and next steps

props.title: Great Job on Challenge 1!
props.message: You successfully printed numbers 1 to 10 using a for loop.
props.explanation: The for loop has three parts: initialization (int i = 1), condition (i <= 10), and increment (i++). This loops through values 1 to 10 and prints each one.
nextSteps: Try the next challenge with a different pattern

props.question: How confident are you with basic for loop syntax?

props.title: Challenge 2: Sum Numbers 1 to 100

testCases.description: Should calculate and print 5050, the sum of 1 to 100

metadata.title: Feedback Box
metadata.description: Shows correctness, explanation, and next steps

props.title: Excellent Work on Challenge 2!
props.message: You correctly calculated the sum of numbers 1 to 100.
props.explanation: You used a for loop to iterate through numbers 1 to 100 and accumulated their sum in a variable. This demonstrates understanding of loop iteration and variable accumulation.

props.question: How confident are you with using for loops in practical applications?
